title: PM for ensuring transparency in providing cheaper wheat flour to KP people
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 6 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday directed to ensure transparency in the provision of cheaper wheat flour to the people of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa from the federal government.
The Prime Minister was talking to his Advisor Engr. Amir Muqam, who called on him here.
The countryâ€™s political situation was also discussed in the meeting.
